title: 16. Your company uses a legacy application that still relies on the legacy LDAP protocol to authenticate. Your company plans to migrate this application to the cloud and is looking for a cost-effective solution while minimizing any developer effort. What should you do?
alternatives: A. Modify the legacy application to use SAML and ask users to sign in through Gmail.
B. Modify the legacy application to use OAuth 2.0 and ask users to sign in through Gmail.
C. Synchronize data within your LDAP server with Google Cloud Directory Sync.
D. Use secure LDAP to authenticate the legacy application and ask users to sign in through Gmail.
